name: Expires
description:
Expires is a single-player 2D platform game set in the bustling streets of China during the COVID-19 pandemic. In this fast-paced adventure, players must reach the underground and collect as many supplies as possible before the time runs out. If they fall into a restricted area or exceed the time limit, they will have to start again from the beginning.

*Press "Space" to Jump  and  Press "left / right" to move
